data.name: Craggenrock
data.detailed_description:
Craggenrock is a crafting shop management game taking place in a remote island after a great disaster. The great evil has been defeated but monsters are still running amok. As a crafter, take this opportunity to improve your skills and make some money.

Features

  • Craft and sell equipment on your workshop with your workstations.
  • Experiment with 200+ materials to craft your products.
  • Explore the 700+ recipes for maximum gold.
  • Accept requests to craft, repair or upgrade your customer's gear.
  • Out of materials? Enter the woodcutter's grocer shop. Order ores and ingots in advance from the mining office. Bargain with the merchants in the market for herbs and monster parts.
  • Issue orders to adventurers to get the items you need.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
